title: Dan Patrick - Hour 2 -  Bubba Wallace
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 2 -  Bubba Wallace
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins filling in for Dan. They discuss the sudden retirement of long-time Villanova head coach Jay Wright.  NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace joins the guys to talk about his rise to stardom, how he uses social media, and what it takes to win a NASCAR race. Doug and Ryan talk about the Russell Westbrook situation with the Lakers and how they see things unfolding this off-season.  #douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
